The `info_*` family of functions to annotate visualisations.

```{r}
library(g2r)

data(penguins, package = 'palmerpenguins')

g2(penguins, asp(body_mass_g, flipper_length_mm)) %>% 
  fig_point(asp(color = sex)) %>% 
  info_marker(
    asp(180, 3950), 
    text = list(content = "Hello")
  )
```
